title: Poster, "Temporal/Contemporary/Spatial/Dynamic-Art & Communications Media Conference", 1977
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted lower left: June 3,4,5 / 1977; and in thinner font: Annenberg / School of / Communications / University  / of Southern California / in cooperation / with the ARTS / Information  Center. Imprinted in orange lower right corner: Photography Raul Véga
provenance: From the collection of Dan friedman
description: At upper section in dark blue and white, a photographic reproduction of a nebula. Below, horizontal registrars of cloud-like shapes in three shades of light blue strech across the sheet. Lower quadrant is white.  At center in black and white, a square with a photograph of an ear and an eye. The words; Arts & / Communications  / Media  with an orange sphere hover above the eye. Printed in orange upper left and upper right: spatial / temporal / contemporary / dynamic.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Temporal/Contemporary/Spatial/Dynamic-Art & Communications Media Conference", 1977.
1977. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-209.
